message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.SY 

Reasoning: The paper deals with a generalization of stochastic bandits, which is a well-studied problem in machine learning and optimization. The use of a dissimilarity function and the construction of an arm selection policy suggest that the paper belongs to the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of Lipschitz continuity and the analysis of regret bounds suggest that the paper also belongs to the sub-categories of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS) and information theory (cs.IT). Finally, the mention of minimax optimality suggests that the paper may also belong to the sub-category of control systems (cs.SY).
